name: Tale of an Arrow to the Knee
name_original: Tale of an Arrow to the Knee
description:
I created this game for my Game Design Capstone. While some focus on mechanics, I love to write stories and believe in stories in gaming. So, I decided to make a visual novel, or so I thought. This was a major learning experience for me. I learned that I need to hire artist and others to help make this story what I envision. Currently, I am using art I have found online and have credited the artist. Hopefully, I will be able to commission an artist and have art dedicated to my game. With that being said, I will continue to make updates and changes. As my experience in writing and game design improves, this game will also be improved. I hope you all enjoy this not so good visual novel.

People I would like to thank:

Artists:
Donmalo
XGhastX
DamianKrzywonos
PiotrDura
Nele-Diel

Character Art:
Design Haven

Menu Art:
Jennifer Dobyns

user Tayruh
